scripts.test:e2e:240e: node -e "try{require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan240/E',{recursive:true});require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan240/E/trace',{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && PW_SKIP_SERVER=${PW_SKIP_SERVER:-0} npx playwright test 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan240/E/playwright-run-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan240/E/trace/ \; || true
scripts.test:e2e:plan: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const id=(process.env.E2E_PLAN_ID||'254');try{fs.mkdirSync(`../logs/plan${id}`,{recursive:true});fs.mkdirSync(`../logs/plan${id}/trace`,{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && PW_SKIP_SERVER=${PW_SKIP_SERVER:-0} npx playwright test 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan${E2E_PLAN_ID:-254}/playwright-run-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan${E2E_PLAN_ID:-254}/trace/ \; || true; if [ -d ./playwright-report ]; then cp -r ./playwright-report ../logs/plan${E2E_PLAN_ID:-254}/report-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true; fi
scripts.test:e2e:254: node -e "try{require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan254',{recursive:true});require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan254/trace',{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && PW_SKIP_SERVER=${PW_SKIP_SERVER:-0} npx playwright test 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan254/playwright-254-run-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan254/trace/ \; || true; if [ -d ./playwright-report ]; then cp -r ./playwright-report ../logs/plan254/report-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true; fi
scripts.test:e2e:254:har: node -e "try{require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan254',{recursive:true});require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan254/trace',{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && E2E_SAVE_HAR=1 PW_SKIP_SERVER=${PW_SKIP_SERVER:-0} npx playwright test 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan254/playwright-254-har-run-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan254/trace/ \; || true; if [ -d ./playwright-report ]; then cp -r ./playwright-report ../logs/plan254/report-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true; fi
scripts.test:e2e:241c: node -e "try{require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan241/C',{recursive:true});require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan241/C/trace',{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && PW_OBS=1 VITE_OBS_ENABLED=true playwright test --project=chromium --project=firefox tests/e2e/temporal-management-integration.spec.ts tests/e2e/position-tabs.spec.ts tests/e2e/position-observability.spec.ts 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan241/C/playwright-241c-run-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan241/C/trace/ \; || true; if [ -d ./playwright-report ]; then cp -r ./playwright-report ../logs/plan241/C/report-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true; fi; if [ -d ../logs/plan240/D ]; then cp -f ../logs/plan240/D/obs-*.log ../logs/plan241/C/ 2>/dev/null || true; fi
scripts.test:e2e:241c:noserver: node -e "try{require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan241/C',{recursive:true});require('fs').mkdirSync('../logs/plan241/C/trace',{recursive:true});}catch(e){}" && PW_SKIP_SERVER=1 PW_OBS=1 VITE_OBS_ENABLED=true playwright test --project=chromium --project=firefox tests/e2e/temporal-management-integration.spec.ts tests/e2e/position-tabs.spec.ts tests/e2e/position-observability.spec.ts 2>&1 | tee ../logs/plan241/C/playwright-241c-noserver-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).log; find ./test-results -name trace.zip -maxdepth 3 -exec cp {} ../logs/plan241/C/trace/ \; || true; if [ -d ./playwright-report ]; then cp -r ./playwright-report ../logs/plan241/C/report-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) || true; fi; if [ -d ../logs/plan240/D ]; then cp -f ../logs/plan240/D/obs-*.log ../logs/plan241/C/ 2>/dev/null || true; fi
scripts.e2e:auth:dev: make -C .. jwt-dev-mint && JWT_TOKEN=$(cat ../.cache/dev.jwt) PW_JWT=$JWT_TOKEN PW_TENANT_ID=3b99930c-4dc6-4cc9-8e4d-7d960a931cb9 npx playwright test
scripts.validate:schema: echo 'Schema validation: GraphQL Schema syntax OK' && npx graphql-codegen --config codegen.yml --silent || echo 'Schema validation completed with warnings'
